badge.title: 1.2 Project Rationale
badge.description: Present and defend the project rationale

badge.title: 1.3 Business Case
badge.description: Present and defend the business case

badge.title: 2.2 Organizational Alignment
badge.description: On the discussion board, draft and explain how your mission/vision statements support the mission of the company.

badge.title: 2.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, every team member must give feedback focusing on organizational alignment to another team

badge.title: 3.2 HRA Choice
badge.description: Describe your team’ HRA choice and explain your rationale for the decision

badge.title: 3.3 Employee Demographics
badge.description: Present employee demographics and explain how they will support the proposed program

badge.title: 3.4 Other Data
badge.description: Present other relevant sources of data and explain how they will support the program

badge.title: 3.5 Types of Surveys / Instruments
badge.description: Present the types of surveys and instruments to be used

badge.title: 4.2 Draft Goals
badge.description: On the discussion board, post 3 draft goals and rationale for goal selection

badge.title: 4.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, every team member must give feedback to other teams about their goal selection

badge.title: 4.4 Action Items
badge.description: Present action items for team project management

badge.title: 4.5 Draft Timeline
badge.description: Present the project timeline

badge.title: 4.6 Program Ideas
badge.description: Present program ideas to meet each goal

badge.title: 5.2 Team Charter
badge.description: Post a team wellness charter and provide team objectives

badge.title: 5.3 Branding
badge.description: Present branding ideas for the wellness program

badge.title: 6.2 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, each team member must give feedback on another team’ presentation

badge.title: 6.3 Revision
badge.description: Post presentation revisions and rationale for revision based on feedback

badge.title: 8.2 Awareness
badge.description: Present on awareness and how it relates to your program

badge.title: 8.3 Intervention
badge.description: Present on intervention and how it relates to your program

badge.title: 8.4 Environment
badge.description: Present on environment and how it relates to your program

badge.title: 8.5 Role of Incentives
badge.description: Present on the role of incentives and how it relates to your program

badge.title: 9.2 Types of models and Use in Interventions
badge.description: Present on types of models and use in interventions in your program

badge.title: 9.3 Communication
badge.description: Present on communication in your program

badge.title: 9.4 Employee Involvment
badge.description: Present on employee involvement in your program

badge.title: 9.5 Delivery Strategies
badge.description: Present on delivery strategies of your program

badge.title: 10.2 Draft Budget
badge.description: On the discussion board, post a draft budget

badge.title: 10.3 Feedback
badge.description: On the discussion board, each team member must review another team’s budget and give feedback

badge.title: 11.2 Evaluation Plan
badge.description: Post an evaluation plan for your program

badge.title: 11.3 Return on Investment
badge.description: Present on the return on investment for your program

badge.title: 11.4 Measured Changes in Health Risk Factors
badge.description: Present on measured changes in health rist factors

badge.title: 11.5 Evaluation of Culture Change
badge.description: Present on evaluation of culture change

badge.title: 11.6 Evaluation of Goals and Objectives
badge.description: Present on evaluation of goals and objectives

badge.title: 1.1 Background / Situation Overview
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of the project’s background and situation overview by identifying and defending the project rationale and business case

badge.title: 2.1 Mission / Vision / Values
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of Mission/Vision/Values by drafting mission and vision statements and giving feedback to another team

badge.title: 3.1 Individual / Organization Assessment - Data
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of individual/organizational assessment by applying all of the relevant data from the topic areas in this section to your case and by identifying surveys and instruments to be used

badge.title: 4.1 Goals and Objectives
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of goals and objectives by drafting goals for the program, giving feedback to another team, identifying action items, drafting a project timeline, and identifying program ideas that support your goals

badge.title: 5.1 Formulation of a Wellness Committee
badge.description: Your team formed a wellness committee, drafted a team charter, and branded the program

badge.title: 6.1 Presentation
badge.description: Your team presented on the items in Phase I, provided feedback to another team, and revised your presentation

badge.title: 8.1 Health Promtion Program Components and Actitivies
badge.description: Your team covered the topics of awareness, intervention, environment, and the role of incentives in your Phase II presentation

badge.title: 9.1 Motivating Behavior Change
badge.description: Your team covered types of models and use in interventions, communication, enmployee involvement, and delivery strategies in your presentation

badge.title: 10.1 Budgeting
badge.description: Your team demonstrated a clear understanding of budgeting by drafting a budget for your program and providing feedback to another team

badge.title: 11.1 Evaluating Health Promotion Programs
badge.description: Your team presented on the evaluation plan, return on investment, measuring changes in health risk factors, evualation of culture change, and evaluation of goals and objectives

badge.title: 12 Presentation
badge.description: Your team presented on all of the topics in Phase II

badge.title: 14 Sell the CEO
badge.description: Post one strategy you will use in the presentation to the CEO

badge.title: 15 Presentation
badge.description: Craft and deliver a presentation to sell your program to the CEO

badge.title: 7 Phase 1 Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has successfully completed Phase I of the project.

badge.title: 13 Phase 2 Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has successfully completed Phase II of the project.

badge.title: 16 Phase 3 Complete
badge.description: Congratulations! Your team has successfully completed the the entire project!
